phrases: The Stardia materials shop we would been planning is finally opening!
That looks like it weighs about 100 kilograms.
Though she does not realize it.
There are many rare materials, so it will probably be popular.
We came here today to help out with the shop, did not we?
There is still plenty to do.
That will help out a lot.
Hey, is this for sale, too?
It is one of our shop's top items.
That is a sample, so you can all have a taste.
Sorry, that is a trade secret.
When I ate that golden slime back in the dungeon,
it turned out to be really tasty.
Hey, by the way, what is the name of the shop?
We talked it over as a family
and had trouble deciding right up to the last minute...
The Materials Shop With the Best Materials Chosen by Me
The Materials Shop With the Best Materials Chosen by Me!
But we went with Tigerson's suggestion.
We figured it would be better to have our name in it.
I finished handing out all the flyers!
Tigey's up front and ready to be our poster kitty, too.
It is finally happening, Big Brother!
I could probably use this to make medicine.
It is all because you guys promoted the store so much.
Tigerson's doing a great job, too.
I will play with you even more if you buy something inside.
Our lineup of merch is not perfect yet, but we did everything we could for now.
This is all thanks to you, Noir.
I am so proud to have you as a son.
I am the son of a poor noble and lost my job to another noble,
but I was able to enroll at the Hero Academy,
I made a new friend, too.
And we were able to open up this shop,
I guess you figured me out.
I can always tell when you are around, Noir.
You are impressive as ever, Master.
I have come here today to express my determination.
What is that supposed to mean?
I am going to free you from those chains.
I will end this suffering for you.
Please allow me to properly thank you.
Thank you for even saying that, but please, do not push yourself.
I am a coward by nature.
Yeah, you are the type of guy that gathers all the info you can on the girl you like,
then lose her to another guy before you can confess
your feelings to her, and end up crying.
I want to see Master smile.
I want to save Olivia of the hidden dungeon.
How can I free her from the Death Chains without killing her?
I believe... the answer can be found on the 15th floor.
The more difficult the question, the worse it gets for me.
You will now undergo a trial.
If you are alone, go to 1.
If another is with you, go to 2.
I am by myself, so I guess I have to go this way.
M-Master did say not to push myself.
It might be kind of pathetic, but...
So the reason you became stronger
is because of the hidden dungeon and this Olivia person.
I am sorry I did not tell you earlier.
I did not want to put you in danger.
So you want to save her since she helped you out.
I would totally expect that from you.
You are careful when it concerns yourself,
but if it is someone else, you can get pretty reckless.
But that is why you have me.
I will follow you to the ends of the earth!
Hidden dungeon only I can enter!
Let me train in secret to become the strongest in the world!
That password just sounds like you expressing your life motto.
It does almost sound like something I would say.
There is probably a monster in here.
L-Let us just see how this goes.
I stored away some food in a different dimension.
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
That is not funny at all.
I Got Creative, made the Poison skill, and Bestowed it to them.
Another result of the skills Master gave me.
You sure had a blast mocking me earlier.
The next floor is the 15th, right?
There should be a hint there on how to save Master.
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
I mean, it looks just like her.
We can usually talk using telepathy...
These are the real Death Chains?!
Wait, so this is not her?
Apparently, it sent information from level 2 and created a copy of Master.
Free her without killing her and a path will appear
It looks like our only choice is to free her.
Are you the ones who freed me?
I could not move on my own.
I know you are the Death Chains!
Aw, I guess you figured it out.
If I defeat you, Master will be freed.
I wanted to see how powerful I was, too.
If this recreation is not complete, we have a chance.
I guess it is my turn now.
I am guessing you are about a Grade B on Dual-Wielded Daggers.
Not that you will even be able to scratch me with those.
Okay, get a room, you two.
You just show up outta nowhere ready to make out?
How could you, when you have me?
Emma, this one is the real Master!
Master, this is my precious childhood friend that I mentioned before.
See, we were just on the 15th floor...
So the Death Chains made a copy of me.
Olivia, this may be rude to ask you,
but do you have any weaknesses?
I figure if the fake is a copy of you, her weaknesses are likely the same.
Yours are bigger than mine, huh?
So I will not tell you!
Master, could you just tell us?
But I do not want to...
I am sure even you must have faced difficulties in some of your battles.
And I think it was when I was fighting in your town, Noir.
Actually, why not just ignore that thing?
I am happy that you are fighting for me, but you should back down on this one.
Why are you so nice to me, Master?
You gave me your very important set of skills, and you give me useful information.
I have not actually done anything for you.
Coming down here into this dungeon and meeting you
If I had not met you, I would not have been able to protect Emma.
So... I am going to defeat that thing, no matter what.
I am going to check Master's records tomorrow.
Then we should be able to determine the fake's weaknesses.
One of my parents' friends is a historian.
I will try talking to them.
It would look perfect on this wall right here!
And I do not think Noir would like your painting staring at him all day.
Noir and I have been destined for each other since our past lives.
I knew the moment we met!
You must be low on LP!
In that case, leave it to us.
I do not mind taking it all off for you, Noir.
I just had a great idea.
So I will be in front and you can be in back, whisper, whisper, whisper.
This is Lola and Luna's special Pretty Girl Sandwich.
Do not you just want to gobble us up?
An extremely powerful adventurer who uses mysterious skills against her enemies.
When she came to this land, she battled with the cleric Littorine,
and though the battle was fierce, Olivia won.
She possesses the Sacrifice skill and was able to torment Olivia Servant.
That must be a pretty rare skill.
By sacrificing skills learned, physical and magical abilities are
The higher the skill levels, the more powerful the user becomes.
Sacrificing learned skills to level up other abilities...
It does not enhance the other abilities for long,
and I will probably have to do it on the spot.
But this is the only way to deal with the fake.
Get Creative and create the skill hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
I would like to level up more before I face them again.
My job is to eliminate any intruders that come to the 15th floor,
but I do not really care about that anymore.
She copied Master's personality, so she is too uninhibited.
That must be why she just followed her desires and came here.
So hey, why do you want to save your master, anyway?
Being stuck there for 200 years is just too painful!
I want Master to be free!
She is more than just bound there.
I make her suffer excruciating pain regularly
and collect information from how she reacts.
I will sacrifice Passive Defense, Blinding Light, and Night Vision to create...
I-Is this the effect of Sacrifice?
Is that what you thought I would say?
I felt Noir's consciousness just now...
That was not a fatal blow...
This is not enough for me to... lose!
You need to use Discerning Eye!
I Got Creative and made it!
This is honestly a pain, so I am going to end it now.
Do not go dying on me.
Next time, A Battle I Cannot Lose.
